head.title: User guide
head.description: User guide Configuration - how to configure stylelint. About rules - an explanation of rule names and how rules work together. Rules - aâ€¦

body:
#User guide

  • Configuration - how to configure stylelint.
  • About rules - an explanation of rule names and how rules work together.
  • Rules - a list of stylelint's rules.
  • Plugins - a list of community plugins.
  • Example config - an example config that you can use as a blueprint for your own.
  • The CLI - examples and exit codes for using the CLI.
  • The Node API - options and examples for using the Node API.
  • The PostCSS plugin - options and examples for using the PostCSS plugin.
  • CSS processors - how to use the linter with a CSS processor, like SCSS or PostCSS plugins.
  • Release planning - plans and calls-for-help for upcoming releases.
  • Complementary tools - list of editor plugins, build tool plugins and other tools.
  • FAQ - frequently asked questions about using and configuring stylelint.
  • Articles - a collection of articles and tutorials about stylelint.
rawBody:
# User guide

- [Configuration](/user-guide/configuration/) - how to configure stylelint.
- [About rules](/user-guide/about-rules/) - an explanation of rule names and how rules work together.
- [Rules](/user-guide/rules/) - a list of stylelint's rules.
- [Plugins](/user-guide/plugins/) - a list of community plugins.
- [Example config](/user-guide/example-config/) - an example config that you can use as a blueprint for your own.
- [The CLI](/user-guide/cli/) - examples and exit codes for using the CLI.
- [The Node API](/user-guide/node-api/) - options and examples for using the Node API.
- [The PostCSS plugin](/user-guide/postcss-plugin/) - options and examples for using the PostCSS plugin.
- [CSS processors](/user-guide/css-processors/) - how to use the linter with a CSS processor, like SCSS or PostCSS plugins.
- [Release planning](/user-guide/release-planning/) - plans and calls-for-help for upcoming releases.
- [Complementary tools](/user-guide/complementary-tools/) - list of editor plugins, build tool plugins and other tools.
- [FAQ](/user-guide/faq/) - frequently asked questions about using and configuring stylelint.
- [Articles](/user-guide/articles/) - a collection of articles and tutorials about stylelint.
raw:
---
title: User guide
---

# User guide

- [Configuration](/user-guide/configuration/) - how to configure stylelint.
- [About rules](/user-guide/about-rules/) - an explanation of rule names and how rules work together.
- [Rules](/user-guide/rules/) - a list of stylelint's rules.
- [Plugins](/user-guide/plugins/) - a list of community plugins.
- [Example config](/user-guide/example-config/) - an example config that you can use as a blueprint for your own.
- [The CLI](/user-guide/cli/) - examples and exit codes for using the CLI.
- [The Node API](/user-guide/node-api/) - options and examples for using the Node API.
- [The PostCSS plugin](/user-guide/postcss-plugin/) - options and examples for using the PostCSS plugin.
- [CSS processors](/user-guide/css-processors/) - how to use the linter with a CSS processor, like SCSS or PostCSS plugins.
- [Release planning](/user-guide/release-planning/) - plans and calls-for-help for upcoming releases.
- [Complementary tools](/user-guide/complementary-tools/) - list of editor plugins, build tool plugins and other tools.
- [FAQ](/user-guide/faq/) - frequently asked questions about using and configuring stylelint.
- [Articles](/user-guide/articles/) - a collection of articles and tutorials about stylelint.
